name: Tappy Dunk - Crazy Ball
description:
Tappy Dunk is a cool, thrilling and addicted basketball game for players in all ages. Tap the screen and hold your finger to find the perfect angle to shoot. Merge balls to unlock higher-level balls for more perfect shots.

Features
- One tap control, easy to master;
- A great time killer,
- Merge balls to do more perfect shorts,
- Complete the crazy challenge in extreme weather and overcome the obstacles.

Please make sure that leave us a review If you like our game. We are working on adding new features, so your advice is appreciated!
